column3: Latest;Vietnam: An Giang Provincial People’s Court on September 17 sentenced Do Nhu Y
column7: to life in prison for drug trafficking.------On the morning of June 2
column9: the Cambodian-Vietnamese border police in Khanh An commune
column11: arrested the detainee and two others who had left Cambodia with the intention of entering with 4 kilograms of MDMA pills and methamphetamine.------After her arrest
column12: Do Nhu Y confessed to taking drugs from Cambodia to Ho Chi Minh City for only $ 500.------Source: zingnews
